snippet: A victory at Miami on Tuesday would make the Nets the first team to beat the Heat four times during a regular season since LeBron James joined the Heat.
lead_paragraph: A victory at Miami on Tuesday would make the Nets the first team to beat the Heat four times during a regular season since LeBron James joined the Heat.

headline.main: Sweep of Heat by Nets Would Be Striking, if Not Substantive
headline.print_headline: Sweep of Heat by Nets Would Be Striking, if Not Substantive
